articles.author: Silvia Amaro
articles.title: European Central Bank sets its inflation target at 2% in new policy review - CNBC
articles.description: The ECB has now a new inflation goal and is taking climate change into account in its massive bond buying programs.
articles.content:
The President of the European Central Bank Christine Lagarde delivers remarks during a joint press conference in Lisbon, Portugal.

articles.author: Deutsche Welle (www.dw.com)
articles.title: EU fines German carmakers over alleged cartel activities - DW (English)
articles.description: The European Commission has said BMW and Volkswagen colluded on limiting the roll-out of emissions-cutting technology and fined the carmakers €875 million.
articles.content:
The European Commission on Thursday said major German carmakers breached EU antitrust rules by restricting competition on clean emissions for new diesel cars.
The Commission fined BMW and Volkswagen… [+1707 chars]

articles.title: EU: Fully vaccinated persons allowed entry in principle - The Star Online
articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR: Anyone who has received full doses of Covid-19 vaccines authorised by member countries are allowed entry, says the European Union (EU).
articles.content:
